original_text: And Samuel grew, and the Lord was with him and let none of his words fall to the ground.
korean_text: 사무엘이 자라매 여호와께서 그와 함께 계셔서 그의 말이 하나도 땅에 떨어지지 않게 하시니

sentences.original_text: and the Lord was with him
and let none of his words fall to the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 말 중에 하나도 땅에 떨어지지 않게 하셨다
